meaningMnemonic: You have <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>muscle</kanji>, therefore it only does one thing. That's it. It is <vocabulary>single mindedly</vocabulary> doing that one thing. It is <vocabulary>intently</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>earnestly</vocabulary> doing that one thing.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a bit weird. It's the kun'yomi readings, where 一 is ひと and 筋 is すじ. Look back on the vocab words that use these readings to remember this one.
